text.div:
Care Connect SDS Job Role Name

A CodeSystem that identifies the job role associated with the person on the smart card. This consists of a set of Role Based Access Control (RBAC) codes. This code list is externally maintained.

Copyright Statement: Copyright Â© 2016 HL7 UK

This code system https://hl7.org.uk/fhir/CodeSystem/CareConnect-SDSJobRoleName-1 defines the following codes:

name: Care Connect SDS Job Role Name
description: A CodeSystem that identifies the job role associated with the person on the smart card. This consists of a set of Role Based Access Control (RBAC) codes. This code list is externally maintained.
